name: Demon King
description:
Emily Brown wakes up in a basement without any memories of what happened. In that moment, she realizes that she is locked there and has to get out. 

Once she gets out of the basement, she will have to find a way to escape from the house while she makes puzzles and discovers what happened. 

But be careful, because James Ramirez, Emily's kidnapper, won't let you go easily.
